comparison.description: How the relative health of the player should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: How the relative health of the player should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value the relative health should be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value the relative health should be compared to.

type.description:
[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/relative_health)

Checks the current (and the percentage) health value of the entity.

Type ID: `origins:relative_health`

!!! note

    The percentage of the health value can be calculated with the `currentHealth / maxHealth` formula.
